titles.title: To amend the Biologics Price Competition and Innovation Act of 2009 to make improvements with respect to the transition of biological products, and for other purposes.
To amend the Biologics Price Competition and Innovation Act of 2009 to make improvements with respect to the transition of biological products, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation
